pullrequest.title: Sandia Hand stumps -- wait to merge this

content.raw:
I just updated the pull request to retain the Publish/Subscribes with two caveats, which I think are minor.

1. Normally, the full scoped names of the joints are published in the joint_states messages. However, since those joints don't exist, only unscoped names are published.  [See SandiaHandPlugin:156-157](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/df3e133572b44f7932981e1f22b65e38f9d47641/ros/atlas_msgs/SandiaHandPlugin.cpp?at=sandia_hand_stumps#cl-156)

2. The thumb angle is moved away from the default position to avoid obstructing the cameras. Its joint angles are still reported as zeros, which is a slight mismatch from normal behavior.
content.html:
I just updated the pull request to retain the Publish/Subscribes with two caveats, which I think are minor.

  1. Normally, the full scoped names of the joints are published in the joint_states messages. However, since those joints don't exist, only unscoped names are published. See SandiaHandPlugin:156-157

  2. The thumb angle is moved away from the default position to avoid obstructing the cameras. Its joint angles are still reported as zeros, which is a slight mismatch from normal behavior.
